website_summaries.verdict: Done by a popular brand known for its quality and service, this is a universally flattering frame that works well with almost any decor.
pros: Owners love the classic look, easy to hang design, and value of this frame
It also stands out for its versatility as it can be used either in a portrait or landscape configuration
cons: Tends to have some quality control issues with the hanging hardware

customer_reviews.title: Great frame with less great hanging hardware
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, classic black frame. Mat opening for 8x12 measures about 1/16" under 7.5" x 11.5" in both dimensions. Backing board is held in with little bent metal tabs and on the frame I received they were not arranged evenly around the frame. I doubt the tabs will stand up to more than a few bends back and forth. I bent them twice and they already feel like they could break off. Also, the frame comes with two clips that grab onto the backing board rather than clip onto the frame. I'd rather hang it by the frame rather than the backing board which is held in with those flimsy tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGill

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware is poorly designed. There are clips that ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounting hardware is poorly designed. There are clips that slide onto the backing, but they slide. So it is impossible to hang at a certain height. I solved this by inserting some cardboard in there. But who wants that hassle? Plus, when you do the wire, it is very difficult to get more than one exactly the same, which makes it hard to hang a series of pieces with the same frame style. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Gal

customer_reviews.title: not a great product
customer_reviews.text: These are frames. They're available everywhere and pretty much, once you put your cute kid's photo in and hang it, no one knows if you got the cheap one or the pricey one. These aren't really inexpensive, but they are cheap! The clip/wire attachment for hanging, its just dumb. The cheap ones from the dollar store have a better hanging system, for sure. The glass breaks very easily. If you clip the back on too tight, glass shatters. Fun! Go to the Discount store for your frames. You won't want to bother with these.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This frame exceeded my expectations. I bought it for a painting my nephew did, thinking I'd have to buy separate mat cut to a specific size because the painting was about an inch wider. But as long as I had it opened up I decided to see what the painting looked like with the pre-cut mat, and it looked great! A fantastic deal for less than 20 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Dumbrille

customer_reviews.title: 9 x 12 picture frame
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it is supposed to be. I was hoping for a little more depth as I was using it to frame a cross-stitch piece and needed a little more thickness for what I was doing. No matter; I just put artist's tape over all the gaps along the edges of the back (which would not have been there if framing just a photo.) Also, after reading about the one customer's problem with the little triangular opening in the back, I just put that opening at the bottom so dust would not be as likely to get in and covered that with artist's tape also.
customer_reviews.author: dogsandcats13

customer_reviews.title: and this is an awesome alternative (and the matte makes it look even more ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this in terms of the quality. It costs so much to get things framed professionally, and this is an awesome alternative (and the matte makes it look even more premium). It also came with hanging tools taped to the back (see photo). Overall, I'm happy with the product and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Frames for Modern, Minimalist Situations
customer_reviews.text: Simple black frames that do that job well. The material is an inexpensive wood with a synthetic veneer finish. The picture covering is polished glass. I cannot yet comment on durability, as they have only been hung for 6 weeks. Despite the cheaper materials, they visually do the job as intended and form a simple black 'vessel' for pictures that I do not want any detraction from. Good for wall decor situations that require a modern, minimalist appearance. They are lightweight and easy to hang. Bought with:
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice overall. Does fit pictures exactly 9x12. My only quibble is the protective backing that holds the image in place has a little triangle shaped wedge cut out of one corner. I assume this was to make it easier to lift it up, but it also leaves part of the image exposed to damage. Not a huge deal, since it should theoretically be hanging against a wall most of the time, but I still feel it should have completely covered the back. I've bought maybe a dozen picture frames from various sellers, and this is the first one that had a protective cover that did not cover the complete picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kakitamike

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Pretty okay.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent frame at a good price. Like other have said, the "hanging mechanism" leaves a lot to be desired, as it will slide right up the sides and end up at the top, potentially damaging the item you've framed if you're not extra-careful. The included mat was flimsy and poorly-cut, but fortunately we didn't need it. It was packaged well to prevent shipping damage, except everything was covered in styrofoam dust, so the frame and glass both had to be carefully cleaned. Overall, not bad for what we needed, could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great frame!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as part of a wedding gift. It came well packaged and arrived in excellent condition. It appears to be pretty sturdy too. I purchased a night sky type of picture with my family members wedding day information, it was a 12x16. The picture almost fit perfectly but was a little too big so I’m not sure if the picture was bigger than 12x16 or the frame (without may) isn’t exactly 12x16. Besides that it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Frame
customer_reviews.text: This is my regular frame of choice. It looks simple, basic, understated and brings out the good in the art. It is very nice and I paid a fair, respectable price for it. No price gouging. I recommend this product. I was not compensated in any way for this review. I like to give open, honest and transparent feedback on products I like to try. I hope you found this review to be helpful. If so, please click the 'Helpful' button to let myself and others know that it has helped you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame, clear glass
customer_reviews.text: This was a very well priced and attractive frame with optional matting. The frame itself had no gaps or flaws, the glas is clear and arrived undamaged with crisp edges and the matting is attractive. It comes with some mounting hardware and hanging wire but I used a plain screw and the built in attachment. It's not perfectly leveled and there is only a built in for portrait hanging which is weird, but that's what I needed and I later realized it's a very cheap not attached clip that can be placed on any side of the cardboard backing. I'm very happy with the aesthetics, materials, and price of this item
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for something classy, this might be worth a read.
customer_reviews.text: By the look of the item in the product listing, I was hoping for something close to what Target offers at a (slightly higher) price point. Something fairly classy that would make for a great framed art piece or photograph. However, what I got had the telltale signs of being mass-produced. For example, there was "fiber/wood dust" on the item. Overall, the production value was ok, but not worth the price I paid vis a vis something I could probably buy @ Hobby Lobby, Michaels, etc. or Target for a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: G2

customer_reviews.title: Weak Metal Tabs
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I started the process of removing the mat, one of the metal tabs came away from the frame. Later, as I was putting the mat back, another tab snapped in half. So maybe it's some combination of weak adhesion to the frame or really brittle metal, not sure. It did not happen on the first frame in the package, so maybe one was just bad? The frames look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Han

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Frames!
customer_reviews.text: These frames exceeded my expectations in every way. They are wood, with perfectly fitting corners, glass windows, and you don't have to assemble them! This compares to the cheaper plastic frames that are tedious to assemble, never fit well or look right, have Plexiglass windows that will get cloudy after being cleaned several times. These high quality frames are only slightly more expensive than the plastic alternatives, especially if you by the two-pack, and easily worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty as can be
customer_reviews.text: This thing was shrink wrapped with a fine grit sand-like substance coating the frame and glass, fingerprints all over the glass, and the least-reliable hanging hardware that I could imagine it coming with. Great product if you want to waste your money on something unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this frame. I bought four for matching artwork in one of my rooms. The quality of the frame and mat was high. As others have said, the frame was dusty, but all it took was a quick wipe with a tissue and it was clean again. The reason I gave it four stars is that even though the hanging hardware functioned fine for hanging, the style makes it difficult to hang several pictures exactly even. I ended up getting them all even, but with a keyhole hanger or sawtooth, it'd have been much easier. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great value great frame!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived nestled in a styrofoam package, labeled "made in Europe". Pleasantly surprised by the quality, so much that I ordered a second frame. The backing isn't flimsy cardboard, but rather a lightweight particle board, which adds weight to my art piece and holds it beautifully flat. Easy to bend tabs to holds it in place. The Mat is slightly beveled which only adds to the quality. The frame although simple with 45' cuts at the corners, is elegant and doesn't distract from my Art that I collect. I'll be purchasing my frame from this company from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for a family picture, but the size of the mat isn't as stated in the description, and cuts off part of my sons' faces. The sample picture inside the frame had a "mat" measuring 1 1/4 inches on each side. The actual mat is 2 1/4. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged perfectly, the glass was sitting well and was not damaged at all. The frame itself is sturdy and not plasticky feeling. I used this as an anniversary gift to give my husband a really cool chart of where the stars were the first night we met, in the exact location we met (longitude and latitude within the city) I think it looks beautiful the way I utilized it.. I like that you can use this frame right to the borders, or can leave a space like I did :) Options are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Victoria

customer_reviews.title: good value for money. Nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: This is well made for an inexpensive frame.. I like the fact that it includes some hanging hardware. The thing that impressed me most was the outstanding packaging. The frame is in a foam box. Since I'm giving it as a gift to someone who is moving away, I can give it in the box to assure its safe travels.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kalman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Matting On Two Seperate Orders
customer_reviews.text: Although I liked the looks and overall quality of the frame, I can't say the same about the matting that comes with it. The original, the picture with the watermelon emoji heh, had a tear/wrinkling on the matting which faces the outside. Obviously if it was the inside I wouldn't have cared and would've just kept it. So then I ordered a replacement for it, and that came with the same type of defect (the second picture). I don't think I'll order this item again as I can't be sure it'll be non-defective, and dealing with the third-party double return was an issue for these orders.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: The frame itself is strong and attractive. The hanging ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is strong and attractive. The hanging hardware it came with, however, was impossible for me to use - after multiple tries, the metal clips apparently designed to fit snugly around the heavy backing slipped and slid around and simply would not stay firmly in place. The metal clips were too big to be snug on just the heavy backing and too small to fit around both the backing and the mat. I finally gave up and I had to retrofit the frame with separately purchased hardware. I would buy this frame again but resign myself to using different hanging hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J

customer_reviews.title: Great frame, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful picture frame! Clean and with a nice white matting. Comes with simple hanging hardware. Great for the price! The first one that was shipped to me had scratching inside the glass that was permanent, but when I emailed Americanflat they took care of it right away by shipping me a new frame. The new one is perfect--exactly as advertised. And what great customer service!! Would definitely recommend this purchase--my husband and I had a piece of original art by a family member we'd been wanting to hang in the bedroom, and this frame was the right choice because it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are way off!
customer_reviews.text: If you actually want to display a 6x8 inch picture these mats are worthless. It is actually 5.5x7.5 and therefore completely useless to me. Sure they have that info buried in the listing but why the hell does it say 6x8 when it is 5.5x7.5? There is nothing 6x8 about the mats that come with these frames! Oh well after years of lying to their wives, I guess a half inch here and there is not a big deal to them.
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality frames ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my daughters art. They are packaged well, solid and worked perfectly. They have real glass but my daughter wanted her canvas displayed without it. I’ve purchased other frames on amazon for her other pieces but these are the best quality and no hard assembly. Just popped in the canvas, put backing in place and ready to display. They come with wire hangers you can attach but they already have hangers on the backing as well.
customer_reviews.author: AvidR

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting how good of a frame this actually is and it came very well packaged so it wouldn’t get damaged in transit. I would 100% buy this again and I will be. It’s decently heavy and sturdy. I can tell it’s gonna hold up well. Glad I didn’t listen to the bad reviews on here I literally don’t know what they’re talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, simple
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, simple, budget-friendly black frame. The frame itself is attractively minimal and a nice deep black in color, and it's built pretty sturdily. The glass is well-cut, with no sharp edges or chips, although it would have been nice if the manufacturer had cleaned it beforehand -- it arrived a bit dusty, and I had to clean the glass off before I could put the picture in and hang it. I don't think the glass or the frame would hold up very well if dropped, but as long as you hang it securely, it should last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simple frame. Just a tip, I use Velcro tape to hang my pictures up. The frame sticks to the tape just fine but the tape does not stick to the wall when it gets really hot. My apartment heats up over 100 degrees when I'm gone in the summer. These frames have fallen off the walls severaltimes. only 2 have broken out of the 5 hitting the hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't support its own weight - broke and fell a few minutes after hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Clovergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not quite 12x16 -Smaller
customer_reviews.text: It is not 12x16 on inside as described, it’s slightly smaller. Nice frame, will use it on something else but measurements are slightly off.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Canupp

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: One of the frames failed at the corner and dropped off the wall. Upon further inspection, I found that the corners are held together with a small corrugated fastener that clearly will not hold up with the particle board. If you hit the corners with a staple gun or add some wood glue, you might have better luck, but there are better quality frames for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sore fingers with this frame
customer_reviews.text: I liked the frame and the mat was substantial, so kudos on that, but I hated the hanging method. You are given 2 clips and a small spool of wire. You have to gauge the hanging distance of the wire and slide the clips along the backing of frame. After I had twisted the wires and went to hang 3 frames, the clips slipped to the top of the frame and know the wire was showing above the frame. I had untwist all the clips and do it again making sure that the wire was stretched super tight and my fingers are still sore.
customer_reviews.author: Rose E

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre frames, a pain to clean off, and too much styrofoam packaging
customer_reviews.text: These frames are decent but the metal teeth (?) on the back which keep the back panel in place are not symmetrical and therefore, the back panel is not always kept in place equally on all sides. In addition, the hardware to hang the frames has to be inserted into the back panel and since the metal teeth arent in the correct place, the hardware often slipped up into the wrong place. I wish I had just gone to target and bought simple frames. Not only was it a huge hassle to wipe down and clean the tiny styrofoam off each frame, but all that terrible packaging will now go into a land fill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Frames of this size are usually on the pricier side, so i was definitely excited to find something that wouldn’t cost me an absurd amount. I wasn’t expecting it to be all that but was surprised at how nice these were! I opted to do the 8x10 photo with the mat and it came out so good! I used these to hang prints up in our bathroom (prints from Etsy) and will be buying more for other rooms. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back for more - best value for quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these frames multiple times over the past two years and will continue to do so. The frames have never come damaged and are always in pristine condition upon arrival - this is coming from someone who now owns 10+ 8x10 frames that have been ordered several months apart on multiple occasions. Not once have I had a frame that came with any damages, dust or quality issues. In regards to the hanging hardware, I have personally never used any of what the picture comes with. I typically use command strips to put these up as I don't want to put any holes in the wall, but the hardware itself looks extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a few of these frames in the past and this month, I needed two more. From the two that arrived, despite the UPS box being in great shape, one was completely shattered. No problem, things happen, right? So I sent it back and purchased another from Amazon. The replacement at first glance seemed fine but it too has a problem, namely that there are three deep scratches in the glass. If I didn't need it to match my other frame, I wouldn't order again but here I am. Thirds the charm, right?
customer_reviews.author: S. Osati

customer_reviews.title: Good frames but arrived covered in dirt
customer_reviews.text: The picture frames themselves are really nice. I am disappointed though because I ended up going with these (a nicer option than the others) but when I uppackaged them, they were covered in dust and a greasy film. I ended up having to take the frame, glass, and mat completely apart to clean it just to put my photos in them. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Neubauer-Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture frame with glass! Nothing flimsy here. I bought two frames. That's the picture that came with it. I've ordered NASA posters from New Horizons Aviation on Amazon to put in these. It has easel stand and hooks and wire included for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a few oddities
customer_reviews.text: The frame looks good and the picture was easy to insert, although some of the picture got cut off with the matt. I guess that's expected since you need a definite border on the picture in order to use the matt part. The back hanging material is a little weird to install, but easy to hang on a regular push pin. I wouldn't recommend this frame if you're going to be changing pictures a lot, because the little metal stubs that hold the back into place seem like they could break if you start bending them too much. Otherwise, a decent frame for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Moon StarsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you can buy similar frames for less money but there are many things I liked about it. 1. The packaging is excellent - very little chance of getting broken glass 2. The backing retention clips are good quality, not those annoying staples that cheaper frames use. 3. The hanging hardware is high quality. No chance of the frame falling off the wall due to hardware problems.
customer_reviews.author: Math AddictTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a picture frame online before, but they found a way to ship it. I like how there is a wire to install for hanging, and it uses clip shaped attachments, so you don't have to hammer on the frame to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Same as the old certificate frames
customer_reviews.text: I got these to match the old certificate frames that are no longer sold by the same company. These are actually itentical to those even though the pictures make the frame look narrower. The mat is a hair too small for an 8.5 x 11 certificate so edges are cut off. Overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Apples and Oranges

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put a very special 15th wedding anniversary picture in it. My wife unwrapped it, picked it up, and the bottom piece broke off in her hand. Needless to say, it didn’t go over well. I’d like to get a new one or get a refund, but there is no option for “it broke so please send me a new one”.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Newman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Matting and frame make my photograph look good. The hanging tabs could be better designed, as they simply tuck under the fiberboard backing and can slip a bit. The backing is held on by metal tabs that you bend down to secure. These will probably not last is you change out the pictures frequently. Definitely not like a custom professional frame, but worth the $15 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Nice frames
customer_reviews.text: These frames look great on the wall. I hung a bunch of photos that were just sitting around in a drawer. Now i get to smile overtime I look at them. One frame came broken, and amazon exchanged it for me with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: maxi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame, some assembly required but not difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I think they're fabulous. They're heavy duty, they look great, and they came with a wall mounting kit (brackets and plenty of wire). The kit allows you to set the frame up for portrait or landscape hanging. It didn't say anything about how to secure the brackets but I don't trust gravity so I reinforced them by taping them to the backing (the side that faces toward the photo). They lose a star for not providing more info on the mounting system. Overall beautiful frames--I'm very pleased with how they look in my office!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A James

customer_reviews.title: Basic but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: If you have need of the wire hanger it's easy to overlook in the packaging. Mine came with both. Basic frame, doesn't look bad. Was able to fit custom cut mat with foam board backing and back that came with the frame, which you need to use the wire hanger. It was tight but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and endless class!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous frames. They are thick and heavy but not thick enough to require extra support past a phillip’s head nail. So high quality and classy. My room feels like a celebrity space with these
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: They were packaged nicely to prevent damage and I'm very happy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 frames. They were packaged nicely to prevent damage and I'm very happy with the quality of them. It is real glass, not plexi glass like a lot of the frames online. There was some white film on the frame when I opened up the packaging, but wiped off right away. The hanging hooks were easy to install. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: inna liu

customer_reviews.title: Best Frames I've Found on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great frame. Easy to assemble and looks very nice. The little clips on the back that secure the cardboard backing to the wooden frame are much easier to use, and easier on your fingertips, than other frames I have bought here on Amazon that use pressure clips. And the hanger piece comes already attached, no awkwardly nailing it in. The mat was easy to use. Packaging was also a big plus here, very secure and frustration-free unboxing. This is the 5th frame I've bought on Amazon, and the first from this vendor/manufacturer. This is definitely my new preferred online frame vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great frame-great price
customer_reviews.text: I broke the glass on a frame that held a beautiful watercolor from a trip we took a few years ago. Instead of getting just the glass, which seemed like a waste of time and expense, I ordered a new frame. I was pleased to see the frame was made in Poland because this was an artwork from a trip we took to Eastern Europe. The frame was a bit wider than the original one and actually made the artwork pop out even more. It was packed beautifully so that it wouldn't break during the shipping. I couldn't be happier with the quality and the customer service check-in from the company. Would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: A+ frame, especially considering its budget price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It comes cavity packed in Styrofoam, which is great -- I ordered 2 frames and there was no damage to either. Just be prepared for the Styrofoam to shed a bit as you slit the tape to remove the frame from the cavity. I'm also satisfied with the sturdiness of the hanging hardware that comes with it. I don't tend to love using wires to mount frames, but if you're going to use a wire, this one is pretty good. Hooks are easier in many respects, but be aware, this does not come with hooks.
customer_reviews.author: mbg

customer_reviews.title: Correct size for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This frame matches the style of other pictures hanging in the bedroom. It was easy to put my picture into the frame. Hanging was easy as there are hangers on the back for either portrait or landscape hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Long

customer_reviews.title: WHAT WE WERE LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Real glass, not plexiglass. Comes packed like you wouldn't imagine. I am ordering these frames on a regular basis for our music publishing company. Photo attached of the start of the display.
customer_reviews.author: INTERNATIONAL MUSIC SYNDICATE

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed Frame
customer_reviews.text: Well designed frame with multiple hanging options. Appearance is sleek but not overly fancy. I bought the 8x10 version and the mat is sized perfectly to maximize the area of the photo on display.
customer_reviews.author: Darkknight1951

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Did not withstand a drop from a few inches. Glass held but frame broke. Very cheaply made. I suppose you get what you pay for. Next time I'll spend a few bucks more and get something that isn't cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Earline L. Ahonima

customer_reviews.title: This frame is fine for what I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: This frame is fine for what I paid for it. However, it has a goofy hanging system, and I fully expect it to fall off the wall and shatter. There's no way to attach the hanging brackets or wire. They slip onto the sides of the cardboard that is then "secured" by the metal thingies that you push down on top of said cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am SO sick of receiving broken orders. This will be my third this week. Amazon need to give their drivers handling classes while delivering. Or someone. It’s gwtting really freaking old.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value.
customer_reviews.text: This frame and mat far exceeded my expectations. The frame is excellent quality, sturdy, and did not have a single scratch on the color. It is hard to find similar frames in the stores that don't have at least a minor scratch or defect. The glass and matting are durable and high quality, both clean and well cut. And what surprised me the most was the care and detail of the packaging. The frame came encased in styrofoam and plastic and was overall well protected. The price is beyond reasonable. I will be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mind

customer_reviews.title: Slightly damaged, but nice frame otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice frame, but the mat border that came with it was damaged in the corner. It seemed like the kind of thing that probably doesn't happen very often, but I ended up returning it and buying a frame elsewhere. Also, in case anyone is wondering it does not come with a stand on the back, so it is perfect if you want to hang it on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Frames come dirty and need assembly!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are nice looking after you give them a deep clean and assemble the wire and hanging clips. The frames come wrapped in Styrofoam, but are very dusty or dirty, including the glass. It took some time to clean the 6 frames I purchased and then I had to connect the clips with wire to the back. This was a project, not the easy assembly I had anticipated. Should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Well Packaged Frames
customer_reviews.text: Affordable frame that worked perfectly for our 8x12 photos. Came well packaged. Ordered 3 and all arrived in perfect condition. Actually reused the boxes to mail out to family once we had placed our photos inside, and they all got to their new destinations safely. Frame style is for hanging, not a stand-up style.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Simple and looks good
customer_reviews.text: the glass wasn't very clean, I had to do some cleaning and polishing, nothing new, but end result was that I got a couple of compliments on the nice frame and picture, so simple and graceful. I think the frame you all provided added quite a bit, to that simplicity and to the gracefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Regular guy

customer_reviews.title: The frame looks great from the front but I was very disappointed in ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame looks great from the front but I was very disappointed in the hanging hardware and the fact that it was not attached to the frame and I had to attempt to assemble it to the back. It seems very unsteady and the little clips tend to move. I guess I had seen the reviews from the 2015 models that had the hangers attached at the top and sides and assumed that I would be getting that product. Disappointing regardless of price.
customer_reviews.author: marmstro

customer_reviews.title: Display space is only 8.5 x 11.5
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 9x12 picture, please be aware that the opening without the mat is only 8.5 x 11.5, not 9x12. Otherwise, the frame is good quality and came very well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Jones

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’d say give yourself time to inspect if it’s for a gift. The frame itself is very nice. The mat came with some minor smudges we had to razor blade off as it was a gift and no time to return. The glass had a small blob of epoxy or other goo on it that we were also able to get off with a razor blade. Small chip on edge of glass as well.
customer_reviews.author: Manis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a magazine
customer_reviews.text: It was pricy, but the reviews said it holds an entire magazine which it didn’t. I ended up having to cut mine up and I’m pissed because I didn’t want to have to do that. Great frame and quality otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for over twenty years to find the right sized frame for a matted print I have. It's 9x12 and almost impossible to find one. I'm so happy to have found one that works! And the style is perfect too!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for an alternative guest book for my friends bridal shower, the white boarder frame was the perfect size for our "Kiss the Miss Goodbye" idea. Everyone put lipstick on and kissed a part of the white boarder and then signed by their lips and the end result was way cuter than we expected. The frame was very high quality and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: This frame looks good, but functions poorly. The back which holds the picture or photo against the glass is held in the frame with tiny thin pieces of metal. I had to bend them open a second time to adjust my photo, four of the pieces broke in half and would not stay in the frame. It's just barely staying put together with the few remaining pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Schultz

customer_reviews.title: stiff cable, tight fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit into the USB-C connector seems awfully tight. I don't know if that means it might damage the mating connector in my phone. The wire is also a bit stiff.
customer_reviews.author: just the truth

customer_reviews.title: Great display on wall
customer_reviews.text: Cheap backing. Extreme packaging with buffered corner covers, then enclosed in fitted cardboard box. Frame looks great as pencil sketch display on white wall. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass too small, frame too thin
customer_reviews.text: Glass not nearly as big as frame and your picture slides around inside. Why didn't this company spend ten cents on a bigger piece of glass? In addition, the listing I saw made it look like this frame is thick and can accomodate a thick painting....just the canvas, but thick. Well, it can't. It isn't any deeper than a cheap frame, and this isn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Margee 2019

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! I removed the mat to put an 11x14 poster inside and it fit perfectly. I haven't hung it up as I am gifting this to someone, but the hangings look sturdy and there are simple directions included on how to hang. Frame and glass are good quality, and the price is right. Arrived quickly and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good price for general purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Let's give to this item 5 stars because it does the job and it is inexpensive. However, please consider that if you are planning to use a frame for a very important certificate or diploma, this might not be the best idea. This because it is minimalist and not with a great glass quality. Attach is the artwork I framed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These frames look very clean and professional and come with added hooks and wires if needed. They are the best value I have purchased. I will be gifting one this Christmas with a very nice print, and I'm sure the frame will do it justice. I will also be purchasing several more for my own photographs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pekoc

customer_reviews.title: Great frame - terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Great quality and everything looks nice. It comes with hanging attachments that you have to put on yourself. I bought these as gifts, so I didn't attach them. The thing I hated was the packaging. The Styrofoam was cheap and fell apart...it didn't come in a box so I couldn't mail these back out very easily. I was very disappointed in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is much heavier and sturdier than I thought it was going to be. The measurement (11 x 14) is accurate. Overall it's just a very nice simple frame.
customer_reviews.author: SlimeBallBuilder

customer_reviews.title: Frames Are Great, Pieces Provided to Hang the Frame Are Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The frames are great, but the hanging mechanism that it comes with is not worth using. It has a couple of metal pieces that you are supposed to attach to the metal wire they include, but even after putting it all together and attaching to the frame, it ends up hanging loose at best, and just sliding off at worst. Ultimately, they just didn't work. Unless you plan on purchasing a separate mounting piece/rack to attach to this frame, I would not recommend purchasing this frame for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: MangoStarfishCreations

customer_reviews.title: You've Been Framed
customer_reviews.text: Good value frame. Easy to get your picture in, and easy to setup for hanging. The appearance is kind of neutral. It's not super fancy, but it doesn't look cheap. Worked really well for a large photograph.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mark

customer_reviews.title: must jerryrig to hang properly
customer_reviews.text: Point drivers (metal tab closures) need to be aligned in order to hang straight by wire brackets. Instructions show illustrations with these in perfect alignment, but really they're just randomly stuck around the frame. Had to insert tiny nails, without splitting frame or off-setting mat, to attach wire brackets and hang properly. Also found dents and nicks and scratches on front of frame, very visible in black, so required touch up of wood finish. Very obviously "Made in China" quality, but guess good frame would cost lots more.
customer_reviews.author: John Habbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame for Wall Art
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this frame, in this size, for a piece of fan art that I purchased on Etsy. I needed to remove the mat but he art looks great without it. The frame appears to be sturdy and it was packed well in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bogaert

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price and the mats are well cut. They even include a huge pattern on paper to help you space them out on your wall. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: these frames are attractive, well built and carefully packed for shipping
customer_reviews.text: This picture frame has several great features. One, it is attractive, two it is well built and three, it is well packaged when shipped. Indeed, the picture frame is uniformly colored and the matting is a clean white, the frame is well constructed and easy to take apart and put together again, and, equally importantly, care was taken in the packaging so my frame arrived with no damage. I recommend these frames to anyone looking for one of this size the are inexpensive and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Regan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult sized frame to find, and I'm so happy with this purchase! I originally bought a poster frame from Walmart that was flimsy and damaged I ended up returning. This is high quality material, the glass is nice and doesn't detract from the art I have in the frame, and feels like it will last for years. I definitely got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame! Very hard to find a frame in this particular size. It arrived in careful packaging and looks beautiful on our wall!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn N.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and classy looking frame, packaged great and super fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Packaged nicely to keep safe in transit
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging to keep the frames safe in transit. I bought 2 of these, inserted artwork, and hung using 3M command strips and it looks really nice. I will definitely be buying more of these frames!
customer_reviews.author: iheartmmp

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money but the quality is medium
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money but the quality is medium if you’re looking for a nice picture frame this is probably not it but for the price it’s just fine
customer_reviews.author: Jody the repair gal

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased - inexpensive frame, but not "cheap"
customer_reviews.text: Was worried that this would look or feel "cheap" given the price. Not at all, it's a nice basic black frame. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cox

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but expensive and require some work to put together
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but were a bit expensive. Also kind of frustrating how they require you to put the frames together and it was hard to get them hanging at the same height. Much cheaper frames can be found elsewhere with the same exact quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Easter

customer_reviews.title: Chip in the edge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to frame a photo for a family member as a Christmas gift, but when I received the frame there was a chip in the edge where you could see the material underneath. This would have made a great frame if only there was a little quality control. I would have just painted over it if it had been a scratch, but it's not so easy to hide with such a large defect.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Uses the little pins to secure
customer_reviews.text: Instead of having a little swing holder to hold the pic in, you have to push in those little black things that hurt your fingers and fall out easily. Cheap for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Does not really come ready to mount to wall
customer_reviews.text: **Update** The company contacted me and offered 50% off the frame or a replacement, so at least they are trying to resolve the issue. The frame itself is fine, but the "wall mounting materials" don't work. The clips slide loosely up and down the frame and are useless for hanging with the included wire. Sure it's there, but if it doesn't work that doesn't do me any good. Too bad because frame itself is nice enough. I emailed their customer service, will update if they resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bezzy

customer_reviews.title: This Frame is nice enough I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than I expected. Packaged very well and shipped promptly. Not the greatest frame I have purchased, but good enough for the price that I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Pyroninjistics

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice frames
customer_reviews.text: American Flat is EXCELLENT. I like everything about these frames, great quality, good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan BADMO

customer_reviews.title: Good frame for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is lovely. You have to "install" the hanger yourself. However, it simply clips to the backing and you use a wire to hang the frame. I would have preferred a frame with the hanger already in place, however, this does not include any hammering onto the wood, so it isn't bad. The mat is pretty and in all, it's a good frame for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The picture frame is okay. I think it's overpriced. I was also annoyed that it came in packing material that was all broken up so when I open the box I have little white foam beads all over. I think it's just okay I don't think it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an odd sized picture that was 9x12 and after taking the mat out, it fits perfectly. The frame is not cheap looking and it has glass, not plexi-glass or plastic. This one must be hung on the wall since there isn't a kickstand on the back but I am good with that part because I planned on hanging it anyways. Overall, very happy I found this frame!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lamont

product_meta.title: Americanflat 11x14 Black Picture Frame | Displays 8x10 Photos with Mat or 11x14 without Mat. Shatter-Resistant Glass. Hanging Hardware Included!
feature_bullets: Design: Black 11x14 inch picture frame, perfect for your cherished memories; frame includes a white beveled mat and hanging hardware for hassle-free display in both horizontal and vertical formats to hang flat against the wall
Material: Wood frame with lead free tempered shatter-resistant glass that gives a clear view of your picture
Quality: Durable, gallery-style frame; the frame's front has clear glass and a sturdy backboard to keep the photo in place
Use and Display: Perfect for 8x10 inch pictures with mat or 11x14 without mat; the actual mat opening is 7.5x9.5 inches
Protective Packaging: Americanflat developed exclusive proprietary packaging that helps ensure safe delivery of fragile items; order with confidence, click and add to cart today

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,357 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
